channel.title: RSC Top Servers
channel.description:
http://3hit.net/list/
Still re-designing the website and what not, but it's ready to be put up at the moment.
Submit your servers.
We may be modifying the number of people in the top, undecided whether to make 5-10

item.title: RSC Top Servers
item.dc:creator: @_A_mpd [A]mpd
item.description:
@_A_mpd wrote:

[quote=“Jessekinss, post:52, topic:281266”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=371414.msg2849251#msg2849251 date=1246453157]
Ill stick with what would work out better in the long run, plus id rather not direct my members to a website thats owned by a previous strk-pk moderator, who knows what could happen.
[/quote]

That was honestly the most ignorant thing I’ve heard so far today.[/quote]

For once, I agree with you, Jesse.

Come on, xEnt- what kind of retarded shit is that? You couldn’t come up with a better excuse, or what? Perhaps, you think that some of your players will see other servers on the list, and go play them!

“Who knows what could happen.” Oh, I think I know what you’re going to say next! “OMG my players will see strk-pk on there and go play it!!! they’ll get infected!!!111”

That is bollocks.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Top Servers
item.dc:creator: @Maxillion Maxillion
item.description:
@Maxillion wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:50, topic:281266”]Mapu nothing personal with you or your site, i didn’t want my members to vote here because well i don’t see it popular, or a worthy way of attracting players. I only want 1 website (xtremetop100) that people should vote for, because having a bunch of them just puts them off and forget it altogether. If i was to add a second page people can vote for, id choose the next most popular ‘RuneScape’ category top100 website over this one. Simply because ill go for whatever would attract more players. We both know something like gamesites101 would get more in/outs than this.

Ill stick with what would work out better in the long run, plus id rather not direct my members to a website thats owned by a previous strk-pk moderator, who knows what could happen.[/quote]

I don’t know, it seems fairly popular so far, and besides, Extremetop100 has rs2 servers galore there…Also, I don’t think Mapu is up to anything malicious - just because he was a mod on <THE UNSPEAKABLE?> :P.

I guess time will tell whether or not this site will make it.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Top Servers
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Mapu nothing personal with you or your site, i didn’t want my members to vote here because well i don’t see it popular, or a worthy way of attracting players. I only want 1 website (xtremetop100) that people should vote for, because having a bunch of them just puts them off and forget it altogether. If i was to add a second page people can vote for, id choose the next most popular ‘RuneScape’ category top100 website over this one. Simply because ill go for whatever would attract more players. We both know something like gamesites101 would get more in/outs than this.

Ill stick with what would work out better in the long run, plus id rather not direct my members to a website thats owned by a previous strk-pk moderator, who knows what could happen.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Top Servers
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“Maxillion, post:48, topic:281266”][quote author=KizL link=topic=371414.msg2842699#msg2842699 date=1246065783]

You allow stork pk to be on there? LOL fail

No thx.

I don’t understand why it shouldn’t be there?

It may take a week or so before “accurate” positioning takes place, due to not everybody voting immediately.

I suggest you advertise it on your gaming forum so your users can vote.

Agreed Stork-Pk = FAIL.

Shouldn’t be based on votes. Should how ever be based on how many people are playing.

sorry Mapu but this is fail.

~K!zL
[/quote]

Umm, I personally think it shouldn’t be based on players but actually on activity and development, but unfortunately it’s not possible to do that, so voting would be the next best thing :). Too bad there are assholes on there that talk bad about servers to my their own more popular, though. Good site Mapu, I’ll probably register if I get around to it.[/quote]

I’m going to ponder into developing our own voting system, not sure though. Would be a fun little project.

Site’s gone inactive since I left to Thailand. go figure. I’m going to have alot of stuff going on in the next couple of weeks. Actually recruiting for an RSC development project at the moment for those scouting for a good team to work with.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Top Servers
item.dc:creator: @aaronsc aaronsc
item.description:
@aaronsc wrote:

This is a warning to anyone who is thinking about playing st0rkpk DO NOT.

It is well known that their admins attack other servers, they have previously installed viruses onto the computers of people who use their client (so they can use them to ddos servers) and it is likely they will do so again.

st0rkpk has been banned from advertising on mopar for these reasons and we advise that people do not play their server.

There are other, better PK servers, so just look for a different one.

Is this the stork everyone is talking about? If so… You’ve been warned

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Top Servers
item.dc:creator: @aaronsc aaronsc
item.description:
@aaronsc wrote:

Everyone calm down, it takes time for it to be accurate. It hasn’t even been up that long. Once people log in and vote for their servers it will change. Instead of flaming this, why dont you go vote for your favorite server and start CORRECTING the order hmm? And mapu is right, it takes 2 seconds to vote. If the server is any good the players will want to promote it. So the players that have been promoting their site, see the site higher on the list. That gives me and everyone else a reason to try, because at least then you know, those people care about the server they play.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Top Servers
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

[quote=“mapu, post:38, topic:281266”][quote author=Peter link=topic=371414.msg2820402#msg2820402 date=1244569984]

I removed the “Official” keyword from your title, should stop the spam.

I don’t see how that had any effect on spam at all…

Because you claimed the list you have is 100% accurate and represents the order of how good servers are.
[/quote]

Did I? Would you like to quote me Peter?

See the server owners have to actual tell their players to “vote” before they can go anywhere on this list.

RSCA will stay at the bottom because xEnt prefers the extreme 100, good on him. Now the people who back this will be on top, so when it comes to how “good” a server is, the projection is determined by how motivated their players are to promote their server and vote. I’m sure if RSCA was so good, their players would be voting for their server. It seems they’re not bothered, but the players from RSCPk seem happy enough to take 2 seconds out of their day to vote for their’s. I personally would play RSCpk because of this.[/quote]

Naming something “Official RSC Top Servers” does make a hint that you’re listing the best servers in order, and the order actually represents how good they are.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Top Servers
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:

[quote=“Peter, post:37, topic:281266”][quote author=mapu link=topic=371414.msg2820095#msg2820095 date=1244543305]

I don’t see how that had any effect on spam at all…
[/quote]

Did I? Would you like to quote me Peter?

See the server owners have to actual tell their players to “vote” before they can go anywhere on this list.

RSCA will stay at the bottom because xEnt prefers the extreme 100, good on him. Now the people who back this will be on top, so when it comes to how “good” a server is, the projection is determined by how motivated their players are to promote their server and vote. I’m sure if RSCA was so good, their players would be voting for their server. It seems they’re not bothered, but the players from RSCPk seem happy enough to take 2 seconds out of their day to vote for their’s. I personally would play RSCpk because of this.

Read full topic
